      • findComponentByPath

        public static DataComponent findComponentByPath(AbstractProcess parent,
                                String path)
                                         throws SMLException
        Finds a component in the process/component tree using a path
        Parameters:
        parent - process from which to start the search
        path - desired path as a String composed of process names, process sections and component names separated by characters
        Returns:
        the component with the given path
        Throws:
        SMLException - if the specified path is incorrect

      • findComponentByPath

        public static DataComponent findComponentByPath(AbstractProcess parent,
                                String[] path)
                                         throws SMLException
        Finds a component in a process/component tree using a path.
        Link path format is either '[components/{component_name}/...][inputs|outputs|parameters]/{name}/{name}/...
        Parameters:
        parent - process from which to start the search
        path - desired path as a String array cotnaining a sequence of component names
        Returns:
        the component with the given path
        Throws:
        SMLException - if the specified path is incorrect

        The actual implementation is found using the method URI.
        Parameters:
        process -
        Throws:

      • getConfiguredInstance

        public static AbstractProcess getConfiguredInstance(AbstractProcess process,
                                    boolean mergeMetadata)
                                             throws SMLException
        Generates a configured instance by copying I/Os definition from parent instance (if typeOf property is present), and applying configuration settings.
        Parameters:
        process - process with typeOf and configuration settings
        mergeMetadata - if true, parent metadata will also be copied to the new instance
        Returns:
        new process instance with configuration values set
        Throws:
        SMLException - if configuration is invalid or cannot be applied
